mapper.insert: insert into reply(rno, replyText, replyWriter, boardNo) values (#{rno}, #{replyText}, #{replyWriter}, #{boardNo})
mapper.select: select * from reply where boardNo = #{boardNo} order by rno asc limit #{skip}, #{size}
mapper.update: update reply set replyText=#{replyText} where rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reply where boardNo = #{boardNo}
